meanings.definition: kidvids: videos or television programs specifically made for children
meanings.sent1: My little sister loves watching kidvids on the weekends.
meanings.sent2: The daycare center always plays kidvids during snack time.
meanings.sent3: The birthday party had a kidvids marathon that kept all the children entertained.
meanings.sent4: The colorful animations in the kidvids brought the characters to life.
meanings.sent5: The educational kidvids taught valuable lessons in a fun way.

meanings.definition: kidvids: to watch videos or television programs made for children
meanings.sent1: We usually kidvids together before bedtime.
meanings.sent2: Let's kidvids after we finish our homework.
meanings.sent3: I kidvids for hours and lost track of time.
meanings.sent4: She would kidvids all day if she could.
meanings.sent5: They decided to kidvids instead of going to the park.

meanings.definition: kidvids: belonging to or related to videos or television programs made for children
meanings.sent1: The kidvids channel is always on at our house.
meanings.sent2: The toy store had a section dedicated to kidvids merchandise.
meanings.sent3: The kidvids theme party was a big hit with the kids.
meanings.sent4: Her room was decorated with posters of her favorite kidvids characters.
meanings.sent5: The kidvids industry continues to grow with new shows and movies.
